sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { LoginContext } from '../../context/LoginState' import { RiCloseLine } from "react-icons/ri"; import "../styles/Modal.css" export default function Modal() { const navigate = useNavigate() const {setModalOpen} = useContext(LoginContext) return (
setModalOpen(false)} >
{/* modal header */}
Confirm
{/* modal content */}
Do you really want to log out ?
) }
